dict.acceptation: 立刻，马上；一会儿，不久；快；宁愿；

sent.orig: She was something that is going to be-soon-soon-very soon.
sent.trans: 她的那个自我将接踵而至，马上就要来临。

sent.orig: Hasty love is soon hot and soon cold.
As soon as possible to take measures as soon as possible to see the results.
sent.trans: 要尽快采取措施，尽快见到效果。

sent.orig: Meanwhile as soon as soon as to realize guarantees controls, the related policy hopeful further adjusts.
sent.trans: 与此同时，为实现“一保一控”，相关政策有望进一步调整。
